name: Ylur Overall
description: A lightweight overall in a waffle pattern in a beautiful offwhite color. This overall is for children.

name: Tindur Sweater
description: A sweater that looks like our Tindur cardigan in same pattern, but in offwhite and black. This sweater is made out of 100% Merino. This sweater is for children.

name: Ský Sweater
description: A sweater in 100% Merino and made in a sweet waffle pattern. The sweater is in an offwhite color with orange ends on the sleeves and neck. This sweater is for children.

name: Lava Sweater
description: A sweet high neck 100% Merino sweater in a dark grey. This sweater is for children.

name: Lava Sweater
description: This sweater is made out of 100% merino wool. It is a white sweater with high neck and a sweet pattern on the body. This sweater is for women.

name: Brim Sweater
description: This sweater is made of 100% wool. Oversized fit sweater to men. The color is offwhite with orange ends on the sleves and at the neck.

name: Birta Headband
description: A headband in 100% Merino, in a beautiful beige color. This headband is for children.

name: Rán Collar
description: A sweet collar to spice up your childs outfit in 100% Alpaca. This collar is for children.

name: Tindur Cardigan
description: A cardigan made out of 100% Merino, with a pattern in offwhite and orange. This cardigan is for children.

name: Ský Sweater
description: This sweater is made out of 100% merino. The sweater has a pattern on the body, in a orange color. This sweater is for men.

name: Karnival Sweater
description: This sweater is made out of 100% wool. This sweater for men is oversized with a white body, sleeves in different colors which is blue and pink, and then grey at the neck. This sweater is for men.

name: Ský Cardigan
description: This sweet cardigan is made out of 100% merino. The cardigan has a bubble pattern, in a beuatiful green color. This cardigan is for women.

name: Ylur Cardigan
description: This sweet cardigan is made out of 100% alpaca. The cardigan has a sweet see-through pattern, in a snowwhite color. This cardigan is for women.

name: Sker Sweater
description: This sweater is made out of 100% wool. The cardigan has a sweet pattern on the body, in a beige color. This sweater is for women.

name: Ylur Cotton Bag
description: This is our cotton bag with a beautiful word that is from Iceland and means warmth in English and that really sums up what our clothes should give people.

name: Dögun Scarf
description: A sweet scarf to children in an offwhite color. It is made out of 100% baby Alpaca and can also be used as a headband. This scarf fits ages 0-12 year. This scarf is for children.
